input_n = int(input())
input_s = input()

max_count = 0
max_gram = ""
for i in range(input_n-1):
    gram = input_s[i:i+2]
    if input_s.count(gram) > max_count:
        max_count = input_s.count(gram)
        max_gram = gram
print(max_gram)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s[i:i+2] for i in range(n-1))

print(max(c, key=c.get))
